name: gagglept
description: A teaching aid to help students formulate questions about code, troubleshoot code, and other wonders!

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Leann Labra, Michael Lomax, Kaylee Nguyen, Ethan De La Rosa  and Cherie Walker
